effect.shortEffect: Prevents Attack from being lowered by other Pokémon.
effect.full: This Pokémon's Attack cannot be lowered by other Pokémon. This ability does not prevent any Attack losses other than stat modifiers, such as the Attack cut from a burn. This Pokémon can still be passed negative Attack modifiers through heart swap or power swap.

description.diamond-pearl: Prevents the Attack stat from being lowered.
description.platinum: Prevents the Attack stat from being lowered.
